 * subject
    *  Identifies subject of experiment
    
 * ActivityName
    * One of the activities defined in activity_labels.txt
    
 * field
    * One of the measurement types defined in  features_info.txt
    
 * average
    * Average of all measurements for tuple (Subject, ActivityName, field)
